title: Bug 121323 - XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
description: The XML Edit Data Set dialog fails to persist filter information.
OB: The filter information entered in the XML Edit Data Set dialog is not saved and is lost when the dialog is closed or reopened.
EB: The expected behavior is that the filter information entered in the XML Edit Data Set dialog should be persisted and kept intact when the dialog is closed and reopened.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Enter some filter information.
3. Close the dialog.
4. Reopen the dialog.

Expected result: The previously entered filter information should still be present.

Actual result: The filter information is lost and not persisted.
